title: McKeesport man's death at Pittsburgh mill investigated
title_page: McKeesport man's death at Pittsburgh mill investigated
maintext:
Pittsburgh police are investigating the death of a McKeesport man early Wednesday at the Superior Forge & Steel facility.
Brandon Hanratty, 37, died following an accident at 5:40 a.m. in the quality assurance area of the company’s Pittsburgh branch, along Muriel Street, according to the Allegheny County Medical Examiner’s Office.
A call to the company and the Pittsburgh Public Safety Department was not immediately returned.
